pages.text: Strewn across the overworld, you will rarely find new $(thing)Wild Towers$(). These tall structures contain a $(item)Waystone$() on top, as well as some goodies to loot.$(br2)$(item)Waystones$() can be used to teleport between towers instantly. Simply right click one, and choose where you want to go. You can only teleport between ones you've already discovered though!

pages.title: Wild Towers
pages.text: A $(thing) Wild Tower$(), and the loot you can get from it.

Inside the chest located in every $(thing)Wild Tower$(), you'll find at least one $(item)Paraglider$() - these can be used when held to glide down slowly and cover vast distances through the air.$(br2)Lastly, you can craft $(item)Waystones$() of your own! Note that you while cannot break ones spawned in $(thing)Wild Towers$(), you can break player-made ones. However, you $(l)can not harvest these.$() If you try to do so, you'll just destroy them, like a $(item)Monster Spawner$(). So be careful with your placement!
Not cheap, so don't break it!
